alerts.doctor_no_workschedule: You do not have a work schedule for the selected date!

success.new_appointment: A new appointment has been successfully scheduled!
success.reschedule_appointment: The appointment has been successfully rescheduled!

error.doctor_conflict: The doctor already has another appointment for the chosen time!
error.patient_conflict: The patient already has another appointment at the chosen time!
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during the scheduling of an appointment!
error.invalid_time_range: The start time of the appointment cannot be greater than or equal to the end time of the appointment
error.outside_workschedule: The appointment time is outside the doctor's work schedule!

time_validation_error.heading: Error!
time_validation_error.text: The start time of work cannot be later than the end time of work.
time_validation_error.tip: Please review the work schedule carefully.
